name: food-facilities
description: Use this data set about Mobile Food Facilities in San Francisco (https://data.sfgov.org/Economy-and-Community/Mobile-Food-Facility-Permit/rqzj-sfat/data) to build an application. Please clarify with your recruiter first if you will be doing the Backend Focused or Frontend Focused version of the project, and what language you will be doing the challenge in. Make sure this is clear before you start this challenge.
author: Chantelle Chan
